document_data.name: Mouth of MoreyeusIt is unknown whether this is a title or if Moreyeus is another person.
document_data.daterefs: {{cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2009)/06-28 - Fools as Her Champions}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mouth of Moreyeus''' was an envoy slain by the [[Simbul]] in {{yearlink|1262}}.
document_data.Description: He was dressed in gold clothes, with a spade-shaped beard, and many rings.
document_data.History: The Mouth of Moreyeus was one of many envoys from a city in [[Chessenta]] to [[Aglarond]], who entered the palace in the {{yearlink|1262}}The date in the book is wrong due to editing error; see web cite under invitation by [[The Simbul]]. She judged them to be spies working for [[Thay]], and thus struck at them with lightning the instant they crossed the threshold. There were few survivors, who were soon to witness [[Elminster Aumar]]'s battle with her.
